column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " You and I need to talk . "
#Text=Tarrlok says : " Are any of the other council members here ? "
#Text=Council page says : " I believe everyone has gone home for the night . "
#Text=Tarrlok says : " Then you should do the same . "
#Text=Council page says : " Are you sure , sir ? "
#Text=Tarrlok says : " Leave us .
#Text=You 're doing exactly what Amon says is wrong with benders .
#Text=You 're using your power to oppress and intimidate people !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " And you do n't ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Of - Of course not !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Is n't that what you came here to do ?
#Text=Intimidate me into releasing your friends .
#Text=See , that 's what I admire about you , Korra .
#Text=Your willingness to go to extremes in order to get what you want .
#Text=It is a quality we both share .
#Text=" Korra says : " You and I are nothing alike !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Look , I 'll make you a deal .
#Text=You fall in line and do what I say and I 'll release your friends .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's why you arrested them ?
#Text=To get to me ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I need your answer .
#Text=" Korra says : " No .
#Text=You might be able to manipulate Chief Saikhan into following you , but it wo n't work on me .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " You will regret that decision .
#Text=" Korra says : " You need to be stopped !
#Text=You 're just as bad as Amon !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I 've tried to work with you , Korra , but you 've made it impossible .
#Text=" Korra says : " Still think that I 'm a half - baked Avatar ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What are you gon na do now ?
#Text=You 're all out of water , pal .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " You 're in my way Avatar , and you need to be removed .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 're , you 're a bloodbender ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Very observant .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's not a full moon !
#Text=How - how are you doing this ?!
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " There are a lot of things you do n't know about me .
#Text=" Korra says : " Where are you taking me ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Somewhere no one will find you .
#Text=Say goodbye to Republic City , Avatar Korra .
#Text=You 'll never see it again !
#Text=" Korra says : " You ca n't do this !
#Text=Let me out !
#Text=Garh !

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Korra Mako Tenzin Antagonists Equalists Saikhan Tarrlok says : " Minor Aang ( flashback only ) Air Acolytes Council page Defense attorney ( flashback only ) Ikki Jinora Meelo Metalbending Police Force Naga Pabu Sokka ( flashback only ) Toph ( flashback only ) Yakone ( flashback only ) " Shiro Shinobi says : " After Korra failed to return to Republic City , everyone has been worried about her fate .
#Text=So Tenzin tasked Jinora , Ikki and Meelo with finding the Avatar .
#Text=Unbeknownst to the kids , Korra found refuge in the swamp with Toph , who discovered there was still metal poison in her body , but when Toph tried removing it , Korra resisted .
#Text=Will the airbender kids find the Avatar and help her return to action ?
#Text="
